title: Foster signs & ‘Making the Leap’ candidates
itunes:title: Foster signs & ‘Making the Leap’ candidates
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – break down the latest NFL news, including the end of Deflategate and Von Miller’s impressive contract with the Broncos. Then, the heroes discuss players who can ‘Make the Leap’ in the upcoming season. Plus, is Gregg still ‘The Boss’?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
